name: Pest
description:
Tim must meet his girlfriend in the woods for a picnic. Too bad the woods are teeming with the scariest monsters known to man. Tim will need to capture and use those monsters to clear his path and help him climb his way up. He better make it there without dying.

Move left and right - A,D

Jump - Space

Swing Net - J

Spawn Current Monster - K

Scroll through Inventory - U,I

Main Menu - P
